description:
To celebrate memorial day we had a uniform party and asked all of our guests to show of their uniforms. The uniforms ranged from military to a nun and everything in between.
It doesn't take long for the guests to start playing with each other, and we line up the slaves and get them warmed up with a nice impact scene. Following the beating the slaves are instructed to give Mr. Pierce some attention by worshiping him and making sure he is completely satisfied.
It is very clear that our guests are excited and turned on with all of the uniforms floating around. Unfortunately most of the uniforms are on the floor due to all of the sex in the room. Mr. Pierce puts every one of the slaves on point and tries to fuck all of them out of their minds, and by the end of the night I believe he very well may have.
title: Uniform Party
